document_data.mainbody:
The Storms Front Tavern was a tavern in Waterdeeps Sea Ward.
The tavern was decorated with a nautical theme so it looked like a faux Dock Ward tavern.
In 1480 DR, the Storms Front Tavern was burned to the ground during a confrontation between the deva Jinnaoth IrGadohn and the dark angel Sathariel.
